titles.title: Hymn 48 - As I Journey Thro' The Land

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As I Journey Thro' The Land singing as I go
Pointing souls to calvary to the crimson flow
Many arrows pierce my soul, From without within
But my Lord leads me on, thro' Him I must win

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O I want to see Him, look upon His face
There to sing forever of His saving grace
On the streets of glory, let me lift my voice
Cares, all past, home at last ever to rejoice

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When in service for my Lord, dark may be the night
But I'll cling more close to him He will give me light
Satan's snares may vex my soul turn tho'ts aside
But my Lord goes ahead, leads what'ver betide

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When in valleys low i look towards the mountain height
And behold my savior there leading in the fight
With a tender hand outstretched Tow'rds the valley low
Guiding me, I can see, as I onward go

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When before me billows rise from the mighty deep
Then y Lord directs my back He doth safely keep
And He leads me gently on thro'this world below
He's a real friend to me, O! I love Him so
